Summary: Very old and low budget motel.   Had family member at St. Joseph. Exhausted so stayed at this place.   Do not recommend it.  Overslept 1 hour to noon.  Checkout was 11.  Owner made me pay extra 10.00 for checking out at noon.   Street noise.  Do not recommend.  Was too tired to drive anywhere so stayed here but do not recommend to anyone.  Go down the street to the Best Western Park Plaza in Orange.  1 mile away.
